hopobject.name: X-Loader
hopobject.body: X-Loader is 2nd stage loader loaded by OMAP3 BootRom to start 3rd stage tool like U-Boot. X-Loader code at http://code.google.com/p/beagleboard/downloads/list depends on U-Boot (V1) and is different for different boards and the different boot ways (MMC, NAND, USB/serial download). Create a X-Loader independent of U-Boot, clean up source and support all boot methods in one binary. This is currently done through Steve Sakoman's git repository.
hopobject.shortdesc: Clean up X-Loader code, make it U-Boot independent, have one X-Loader for all OMAP3 boards and one binary for all boot methods.
